justification: "Attention is sometimes measured indirectly ... but increasingly, attention has been measured more directly using eye-tracking."
"Participants first rated their desire for 70 snack food items on a discrete scale from 0 to 10."

"100 trials were randomly generated ... Participants were told to choose their preferred food in each trial. They selected the left option by pressing the left arrow key and the right option by pressing the right arrow key."
